rooms.description: A small foyer area with a mudra (welcome) as per Vastu principles.
Minimalist living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the courtyard, enhancing natural light. Vastu alignment: East side to promote energy flow.
Compact kitchen with minimalistic design and integrated storage, positioned on the north wall to avoid direct heat from the sun.
Small guest bathroom located adjacent to living room for easy access, with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Central courtyard that connects to the living room and kitchen, with permeable flooring to allow water drainage as per local building norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented to the south as per Vastu for auspicious entry.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on living room and kitchen walls to maximize natural light.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to capture morning light, in line with Vastu.
Dedicated home office space designed for minimal distractions and enhanced productivity, with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north wall to balance natural light.
Utility room and storage area integrated with the home office for convenience, following minimalist design.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground and first floor, centrally located for easy access as per local building norms.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the bedroom and office areas for optimal lighting.
